movie.title: Moonrise Kingdom
movie.actors: Bruce Willis, Edward Norton, Bill Murray, Frances McDormand
movie.plot: Set on an island off the coast of New England in the 1960s, as a young boy and girl fall in love they are moved to run away together. Various factions of the town mobilize to search for them and the town is turned upside down -- which might not be such a bad thing.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 47 wins & 91 nominations.
movie.tomatoConsensus: Warm, whimsical, and poignant, the immaculately framed and beautifully acted Moonrise Kingdom presents writer/director Wes Anderson at his idiosyncratic best.
